accessPolicies.title: Access Policies
accessPolicies.description: List of user access policies to activate or deactivate

apiName.description: The API name of the user access policy (e.g., 'Grant_Permissions')

active.description: Whether the policy should be active (true) or inactive (false)

on.description: Optional: specify when to apply the policy - 'Create', 'Update', or 'CreateAndUpdate'
